directions: Place potato cubes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer almost soft, about 7 to 10 minutes. Add carrot slices and boil until tender, 3 to 5 more minutes. Drain.

Meanwhile, bring 6 cups water to boil in a medium saucepan. Add tofu and wakame seaweed, cook for 3 minutes. Stir in mushrooms, miso paste, and cooked potatoes and carrots. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes. Ladle into bowls and garnish with chopped scallions.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package soft tofu, drained and cut into cubes
2 tablespoons chopped scallions, or to taste  (Optional)
title: Miso Soup with Seaweed
